verses.text_plain: In his days Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up, and Jehoiakim became his servant three years: then he turned and rebelled against him.
verses.verse_html: 1In his days Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up, and Jehoiakim became his servant three years: then he turned and rebelled against him.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord sent against him bands of the Chaldees, and bands of the Syrians, and bands of the Moabites, and bands of the children of Ammon, and sent them against Judah to destroy it, according to the word of the Lord, which he spake by his servants the prophets.
verses.verse_html:
2And the Lord sent against him bands of the Chaldees, and bands of the Syrians, and bands of the Moabites, and bands of the children of Ammon, and sent them against Judah to destroy it, according to the word of the Lord, which he spake by his servants the prophets. ▼
▼ by: Heb. by the hand of

footnotes.body_text: ▼ by: Heb. by the hand of
footnotes.body_html: ▼ by: Heb. by the hand of

verses.text_plain: Surely at the commandment of the Lord came this upon Judah, to remove them out of his sight, for the sins of Manasseh, according to all that he did;
verses.verse_html: 3Surely at the commandment of the Lord came this upon Judah, to remove them out of his sight, for the sins of Manasseh, according to all that he did;

tokens.text: according to all that he did

verses.text_plain: And also for the innocent blood that he shed: for he filled Jerusalem with innocent blood; which the Lord would not pardon.
verses.verse_html: 4And also for the innocent blood that he shed: for he filled Jerusalem with innocent blood; which the Lord would not pardon.

verses.text_plain: Now the rest of the acts of Jehoiakim, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?
verses.verse_html: 5Now the rest of the acts of Jehoiakim, and all that he did, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah?

verses.text_plain: So Jehoiakim slept with his fathers: and Jehoiachin his son reigned in his stead.
verses.verse_html: 6So Jehoiakim slept with his fathers: and Jehoiachin his son reigned in his stead.

verses.text_plain: And the king of Egypt came not again any more out of his land: for the king of Babylon had taken from the river of Egypt unto the river Euphrates all that pertained to the king of Egypt.
verses.verse_html: 7And the king of Egypt came not again any more out of his land: for the king of Babylon had taken from the river of Egypt unto the river Euphrates all that pertained to the king of Egypt.

tokens.text: any more out of his land
all that pertained to the king

verses.text_plain: Jehoiachin was eighteen years old when he began to reign, and he reigned in Jerusalem three months. And his mother’s name was Nehushta, the daughter of Elnathan of Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
8Jehoiachin was eighteen years old when he began to reign, and he reigned in Jerusalem three months. And his mother’s name was Nehushta, the daughter of Elnathan of Jerusalem. ▼
▼ Jehoiachin: also called Jeconiah and Coniah

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Jehoiachin: also called Jeconiah and Coniah
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Jehoiachin: also called Jeconiah and Coniah

verses.text_plain: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father had done.
verses.verse_html: 9And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his father had done.

tokens.text: according to all that his father

verses.text_plain: At that time the servants of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up against Jerusalem, and the city was besieged.
verses.verse_html:
10At that time the servants of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up against Jerusalem, and the city was besieged. ▼
▼ was…: Heb. came into siege

footnotes.body_html: ▼ was…: Heb. came into siege

verses.text_plain: And Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came against the city, and his servants did besiege it.
verses.verse_html: 11And Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came against the city, and his servants did besiege it.

verses.text_plain: And Jehoiachin the king of Judah went out to the king of Babylon, he, and his mother, and his servants, and his princes, and his officers: and the king of Babylon took him in the eighth year of his reign.
verses.verse_html:
12And Jehoiachin the king of Judah went out to the king of Babylon, he, and his mother, and his servants, and his princes, and his officers: and the king of Babylon took him in the eighth year of his reign. ▼
▼ officers: or, eunuchs
 , ▼
▼ his reign: Nebuchadnezzar’s eighth year

footnotes.body_html: ▼ his reign: Nebuchadnezzar’s eighth year

verses.text_plain: And he carried out thence all the treasures of the house of the Lord, and the treasures of the king’s house, and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold which Solomon king of Israel had made in the temple of the Lord, as the Lord had said.
verses.verse_html: 13And he carried out thence all the treasures of the house of the Lord, and the treasures of the king’s house, and cut in pieces all the vessels of gold which Solomon king of Israel had made in the temple of the Lord, as the Lord had said.

verses.text_plain: And he carried away all Jerusalem, and all the princes, and all the mighty men of valour, even ten thousand captives, and all the craftsmen and smiths: none remained, save the poorest sort of the people of the land.
verses.verse_html: 14And he carried away all Jerusalem, and all the princes, and all the mighty men of valour, even ten thousand captives, and all the craftsmen and smiths: none remained, save the poorest sort of the people of the land.

verses.text_plain: And he carried away Jehoiachin to Babylon, and the king’s mother, and the king’s wives, and his officers, and the mighty of the land, those carried he into captivity from Jerusalem to Babylon.
verses.verse_html:
15And he carried away Jehoiachin to Babylon, and the king’s mother, and the king’s wives, and his officers, and the mighty of the land, those carried he into captivity from Jerusalem to Babylon. ▼
▼ officers: or, eunuchs

verses.text_plain: And all the men of might, even seven thousand, and craftsmen and smiths a thousand, all that were strong and apt for war, even them the king of Babylon brought captive to Babylon.
verses.verse_html: 16And all the men of might, even seven thousand, and craftsmen and smiths a thousand, all that were strong and apt for war, even them the king of Babylon brought captive to Babylon.

verses.text_plain: And the king of Babylon made Mattaniah his father’s brother king in his stead, and changed his name to Zedekiah.
verses.verse_html: 17And the king of Babylon made Mattaniah his father’s brother king in his stead, and changed his name to Zedekiah.

verses.text_plain: Zedekiah was twenty and one years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.
verses.verse_html: 18Zedekiah was twenty and one years old when he began to reign, and he reigned eleven years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.

verses.text_plain: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that Jehoiakim had done.
verses.verse_html: 19And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that Jehoiakim had done.

verses.text_plain: For through the anger of the Lord it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, until he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
verses.verse_html: 20For through the anger of the Lord it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, until he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.

tokens.text: it came to pass in Jerusalem
until he had cast them out
